item.title: This another post
item.description: I’m new with this so patience Bulding an Staic Site using Hugo. I’ve read about Hugo from a long time ago now but this is the firt time I play with it. Does bold works here. yes it does, I asume Italics too.. yep This could be a great way to build a blog, I you are somehow computer savvy
